title: EXT_lights_area Area Light Properties
description: An area light (rectangular or disk) that emits light uniformly from one side following Lambert's cosine law.

name.description: The name of the light. This is not necessarily unique.

color.description: RGB color of the light in linear space. Each component should be in the range [0, 1].

intensity.description: The luminance of the light surface in nits (cd/mÂ²). Must be a positive value.

size.description: Size of the light. For rectangular lights, this is the height (y-axis) in local space. Must be a positive value. For disk lights, it is the diameter.

type.description: Specifies the type of area light.

anyOf.description: Rectangle lights emit light from a rectangular area.
Disk lights emit light from a circular area.
